meanings.definition: A decorative architectural element that is applied onto a surface
meanings.sent1: The onlay added a touch of elegance to the plain wall.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter carefully attached the onlay to the door frame.
meanings.sent3: The onlay on the ceiling seemed to wink at the guests below.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an onlay, enhancing her already beautiful face.
meanings.sent5: The golden onlay gleamed in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: To apply a decorative architectural element onto a surface
meanings.sent1: She decided to onlay the intricate design onto the wooden panel.
meanings.sent2: The artist onlaid the pattern onto the mosaic with precision.
meanings.sent3: He playfully onlaid the sticker onto his friend's back without them noticing.
meanings.sent4: The memories onlayed in her mind like pieces of a puzzle coming together.
meanings.sent5: The chef skillfully onlaid the chocolate drizzle on top of the cake.
